column2: If it  is  done  with  the  intention  of causing  bodily  injury  to  any
person,  and  the  bodily  injury  intended  to  be  inflicted  is  sufficient  in  the

the harm is caused ; or: ordinary course of nature to cause death; or

column2: Fourthly- If the person committing the  act knows that  it  is  so  imminently
dangerous that it must in all probability cause death,  or such bodily injury

the harm is caused ; or: as  is  likely to  cause death,  and  commits  such  act  without  any  excuse  for
incurring the risk of causing death or such injury as  aforesaid.
